lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "American tax dollars are being used to subsidize foreign agriculture and mineral production that is often in direct competition with our producers," Senator Don Nickles, an Oklahoma Republican, said in a letter to fellow senators seeking support for his legislation to limit these loans.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It argues there might be instances in which a country needed the money to continue its moves toward U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Also, the recipient countries would have to prove that the production, marketing and export of the commodities could be handled without government subsidy.
